sentence.text: This study aimed to investigate negative regulation of apoptotic process expression in tamoxifen resistant (TAM-R) and tamoxifen sensitive (TAM-S) breast carcinoma patients and analyze its correlation with clinicopathological characteristics and survival.

Immunohistochemical analysis was performed to evaluate negative regulation of apoptotic process protein expression in 36 TAM-R and 36 TAM-S formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) breast tumor tissues.
Our data suggested that high expression of negative regulation of apoptotic process could be associated with better survival in estrogen receptor positive tamoxifen-treated breast carcinoma patients
